text:
Gusto | Full-Stack Engineer | San Francisco, CA | Full-time | Onsite

Gusto is looking for talented and motivated engineers with 4+ years of experience. Gusto engineers own entire features in our system. You'll influence the initial specs for the feature, build/modify the backend APIs (mostly Rails), write the front-end code that consumes said APIs (mostly React.js), and be responsible for ongoing improvements once the feature is deployed.
